description: This file is a Python script that defines a function 'write_config' used for generating configuration files (primarily JSON) for plugins, including handling legacy config generation and comparison. It includes logic for setting up parameters, validating paths, and creating config files based on templates and environment settings.

methods.name: write_config
methods.description: Main function for generating configuration files for plugins. Handles argument parsing, path validation, config file creation via external Python scripts, and optional legacy configuration fallback.
